WRITING.TEXT:
I've recently started playing Pokemon again and decided to try finishing the national dex for the first time (in Omega Ruby). Can't get the Legendary Dogs, Kyogre, or Legendary Birds (and missed Mew events ;_;)--but what I CAN get are the Black and White "new" and legendary pokemon. Didn't play anything between HGSS and XY; which of the B/W and B2/W2 would you recommend?
Any help would be appreciated~
Awh. It's alright, at least you got something else you wanted.
What time zone are you in? We could do the exchange soon if you'd like.
No worries! Thanks for the offer regardless.
Would you still happen to have that code?

Unfortunately (or fortunately :p) I've already got a Darkrai hahah.
The Mew however, has my attention.
Huh, really? I'll keep that in mind, thanks!

WRITING.TITLE: LF: Mew, FT: Shiny Yveltal/Xerneas (JPN Event)
WRITING.TEXT:
[event6] [shiny]
First time posting here (and on Reddit in general) so I'm not entirely sure how things work but I'll try!
Got both the Xerneas Yveltal from a good friend who got them through codes when they were being distributed in Japan (last year, I believe?). Both are untouched.
* OT: XY Z (both) * ID No.: 11055 (Yveltal) * 10295 (Xerneas) * LVL: 100 (both)
Your pick which of the two you'd like for a Mew. And if somebody has a Lugia Kyogre (gotta try pushing my luck) they're willing to trade for either, that would be fantastic. No issues providing proof if asked; I don't know what to show as evidence of legitimacy on this post.
Thanks!
